title: It's Not Summer Without You
description:
One girl. Two boys. An impossible decision to make . . .
When something is perfect, you hope it lasts forever. But Isabel's lazy, long hot summers at her family friends' beach house are over.Conrad is the only boy she's ever loved. But he's left for college, taking her heart with him. Jeremiah, his gorgeous younger brother, is still Isabel's best friend - but maybe friendship isn't enough for him anymore . . .Isabel just wants everything to stay the same, because change means moving on. But if she stops looking back, could she find a future she never knew she wanted?Book 2 in The Summer I Turned Pretty series - now a major new TV show on Amazon Prime!
author: Jenny Han
